lines.text:
* But the self <color="yellow">you</color> remember is not the
  self <color="red">you</color> are

* You've shed versions of yourself a
  thousand times...
* And yet, you call that continuity

* What is <color="yellow">you</color> but the memory of
  having been... someone?
* If you take me, I will be you
* If you leave me, I am still you
* So tell me... what will <color="red">you</color> decide?
* You've always been you, haven't you?

* But if you can change, were you ever
  you at all?
* Or maybe... You remember being me
* Does it matter which way it was?

* We only exist in each other's
  reflection

* Every choice you've made-was it
  yours...

* ...or was it the one you were
  allowed to make?

* If I am you, and you are me...
  then who is the one who watches?
